strudel_tracks.code:
// Dynamic Blockchain Audio Pattern
// Generated: 2025-09-07T06:49:23.155614
// Chain: ethereum
// Activity: 75.8
// Volatility: 65.2

setcps(1.62)

stack(
  // RHYTHMIC LAYER
  stack(
    s("bd ~ bd").gain(0.76),
    s("~ sd ~ sd").gain(0.69),
    s("hh*2").gain(0.32)
  ).bank('RolandTR909'),
  
  // LEAD MELODY
  n("<60 62 64 65>")
  .scale("B:major")
  .s("gm_lead_2_sawtooth")
  .clip(perlin.range(0.1, 1.0).slow(2))
  .jux(rev)
  .room(1.6)
  .lpf(rand.range(400, 16000).slow(6))
  .hpf(sine.range(100, 5000).slow(4)).room(0.8).size(0.5),
  
  // BASS LINE
  n("0 2 3 5")
  .scale("B:major")
  .s("gm_acoustic_bass")
  .gain(0.43)
  .lpf(409)
  .room(0.8),
  
  // HARMONIC PAD
  n("0 2 3 5")
  .scale("B:major")
  .s("gm_synth_pad_3_polysynth")
  .gain(0.43)
  .room(1.0)  // Reduced reverb
  .shape(0.3)  // Less shape
  .delay(0.15)  // Much less delay
  .size(0.5).phaser(3).delay(0.10)
)
.late("[0 .01]*2")  // Reduced late effects
.size(1.9)  // Smaller size for less reverb

// Dynamic Blockchain Audio Pattern
// Generated: 2025-09-07T06:49:23.155946
// Chain: polygon
// Activity: 88.7
// Volatility: 70.5

setcps(2.20)

stack(
  // RHYTHMIC LAYER
  stack(
    s("bd ~ bd").gain(0.73),
    s("~ sd ~ sd").gain(0.75),
    s("hh*2").gain(0.51)
  ).bank('RolandTR909'),
  
  // LEAD MELODY
  n("<72 74 76 77>")
  .scale("B:major")
  .s("gm_lead_2_sawtooth")
  .clip(rand.range(0.2, 0.8).slow(3))
  .jux(rev)
  .room(0.8)
  .lpf(cosine.range(250, 14000).slow(4))

  n("0 2 3 5")
  .scale("B:major")
  .s("gm_electric_bass_finger")
  .gain(0.58)
  .lpf(291)

)
.late("[0 .01]*2")  // Reduced late effects

// Multi-Chain Collaborative Jam
// Generated: 2025-09-07T06:49:23.156296
// Chains: ethereum, optimism, polygon, base
// Each chain contributes its unique voice to the symphony

setcps(1.86)

stack(
  // ETHEREUM - Synthesizer
  // LEAD MELODY
  n("<60 62 64 65>")
  .scale("B:major")
  .s("gm_lead_2_sawtooth")
  .clip(perlin.range(0.1, 1.0).slow(2))
  .jux(rev)
  .room(0.5)
  .lpf(rand.range(400, 16000).slow(6))
  .hpf(tri.range(100, 5000).slow(4)).room(0.5).size(0.6),
  .gain(0.66)
  .room(0.5),
  // OPTIMISM - Lead
  // LEAD MELODY
  n("<72 74 76 77>")
  .scale("B:major")
  .s("gm_lead_2_sawtooth")
  .clip(perlin.range(0.1, 1.0).slow(2))
  .jux(rev)
  .room(1.4)
  .lpf(rand.range(400, 16000).slow(6))
  .hpf(saw.range(100, 5000).slow(4)).room(1.3).size(0.7),
  .gain(0.67)
  .room(0.4),
  // POLYGON - Drum
  // LEAD MELODY
  n("<72 74 76 77>")
  .scale("B:major")
  .s("gm_lead_3_calliope")
  .clip(rand.range(0.2, 0.8).slow(3))
  .jux(rev)
  .room(1.6)
  .lpf(cosine.range(250, 14000).slow(4))
  .lpf(perlin.range(200, 20000).slow(4)).room(1.9).size(0.6),
  .gain(0.61)
  .room(0.7),
  // BASE - Bass
  // LEAD MELODY
  n("<72 74 76 77>")
  .scale("B:major")
  .s("gm_lead_6_voice")
  .clip(perlin.range(0.1, 1.0).slow(2))
  .jux(rev)
  .room(1.9)
  .lpf(rand.range(400, 16000).slow(6))
  .hpf(saw.range(100, 5000).slow(6)).room(1.7).size(0.6),
  .gain(0.75)
  .room(0.4),
  
  // COLLABORATIVE HARMONIC LAYER
  n("0 2 3 5")
  .scale("F#:major")
  .s("gm_synth_strings_2")
  .gain(0.22)
  .room(1.0)
  .shape(0.4)
  .delay(0.08)
)
.late("[0 .01]*2")
.size(2.7)

// Experimental Multi-Chain - ETHEREUM Lead
// Generated: 2025-09-07T06:50:02.121442
// Lead Chain: ethereum
// Supporting: optimism, polygon, base

// Experimental Blockchain Audio Pattern
// Generated: 2025-09-07T06:50:02.118291
// Chain: ethereum
// Pattern Type: experimental

setcps(1.62)

stack(
  // Complex rhythmic foundation
  stack(
    s("bd ~ bd").struct("<[x*<1 2> [~@3 x]] x>"),
    s("~ [rim, sd:<2 3>]").room("<0 .2>"),
    n("[0 <1 3>]*<2!3 4>").s("hh"),
    s("rd:<1!3 2>*2").mask("<0 0 1 1>/16").gain(.5)
  ).bank('RolandTR909')
  .mask("<[0 1] 1 1 1>/16".early(.5)),
  
  // Lead melody with complex modulation
  n("<60 62 64 65>")
  .scale("B:major")
  .s("gm_lead_3_calliope")
  .clip(perlin.range(0.1, 1.0).slow(2))
  .jux(rev)
  .room(1.7)
  .lpf(rand.range(400, 16000).slow(6))
  .phaser(7)
  .shape(0.4),
  
  // Bass line with rhythmic variation
  n("0 2 3 5")
  .scale("B:major")
  .s("gm_synth_bass_1")
  .gain(0.73)
  .lpf(611),
  
  // Harmonic pad with texture
  n("0 2 3 5")
  .scale("B:major")
  .s("gm_synth_pad_3_polysynth")
  .gain(0.25)
  .room(0.9)  // Reduced reverb
  .shape(0.3)  // Less shape
  .delay(0.08)  // Much less delay
  .fm(sine.range(3, 8).slow(8))
  .lpf(sine.range(500, 1000).slow(8)).lpq(5)
  .rarely(ply("2")).chunk(4, fast(2))
  .gain(perlin.range(.6, .9))
  .mask("<0 1 1 0>/16")
)
.late("[0 .01]*2")  // Reduced late effects
.size(3.5)  // Smaller size for less reverb

// Supporting chains
stack(
  // OPTIMISM - Supporting
  n("<72 74 76 77>")
  .scale("B:major")
  .s("gm_lead_3_calliope")
  .gain(0.26)
  .room(0.7)
  .lpf(796),
  // POLYGON - Supporting
  n("<72 74 76 77>")
  .scale("B:major")
  .s("gm_lead_6_voice")
  .gain(0.48)
  .room(0.4)
  .lpf(727),
  // BASE - Supporting
  n("<72 74 76 77>")
  .scale("B:major")
  .s("gm_lead_6_voice")
  .gain(0.40)
  .room(0.6)
  .lpf(349)
)
